BindDBResourceGroupWithUser.title: BindDBResourceGroupWithUser
BindDBResourceGroupWithUser.summary: Associates a resource group of an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster with a database account.

CreateAccount.title: CreateAccount
CreateAccount.summary: Creates a database account for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

CreateDBResourceGroup.title: CreateDBResourceGroup
CreateDBResourceGroup.summary: Creates a resource group for an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

CreateElasticPlan.title: CreateElasticPlan
CreateElasticPlan.summary: Creates a scheduled scaling plan. This operation can be used only for AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters in elastic mode for Cluster Edition.

DeleteDBCluster.title: DeleteDBCluster
DeleteDBCluster.summary: Deletes an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DeleteDBResourceGroup.title: DeleteDBResourceGroup
DeleteDBResourceGroup.summary: Deletes a resource group from an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

DeleteElasticPlan.title: DeleteElasticPlan
DeleteElasticPlan.summary: Deletes a scheduled scaling plan. This operation can be used only for AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters in elastic mode for Cluster Edition.

DescribeAccounts.title: DescribeAccounts
DescribeAccounts.summary: Queries a list of database accounts for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeAdviceServiceEnabled.title: DescribeAdviceServiceEnabled
DescribeAdviceServiceEnabled.summary: Queries whether the suggestion feature is enabled for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeAllDataSource.title: DescribeAllDataSource
DescribeAllDataSource.summary: Queries a list of databases, tables, and columns in a cluster.

DescribeAppliedAdvices.title: DescribeAppliedAdvices
DescribeAppliedAdvices.summary: Queries the applied optimization suggestions for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeAuditLogRecords.title: DescribeAuditLogRecords
DescribeAuditLogRecords.summary: Queries the SQL audit logs of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeAutoRenewAttribute.title: DescribeAutoRenewAttribute
DescribeAutoRenewAttribute.summary: Queries the auto-renewal status of a subscription AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeAvailableAdvices.title: DescribeAvailableAdvices
DescribeAvailableAdvices.summary: Queries the available suggestions for cluster optimization.

DescribeBackups.title: DescribeBackups
DescribeBackups.summary: Queries a list of backup sets for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeComputeResource.title: DescribeComputeResource
DescribeComputeResource.summary: Queries the specifications of computing resources for AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) clusters within a region.

DescribeConnectionCountRecords.title: DescribeConnectionCountRecords
DescribeConnectionCountRecords.summary: Queries the current number of connections to an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDBClusterAccessWhiteList.title: DescribeDBClusterAccessWhiteList
DescribeDBClusterAccessWhiteList.summary: Queries a list of IP address whitelists for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDBClusterAttribute.title: DescribeDBClusterAttribute
DescribeDBClusterAttribute.summary: Queries the information about an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDBClusterPerformance.title: DescribeDBClusterPerformance
DescribeDBClusterPerformance.summary: Queries the performance data of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDBClusterResourcePoolPerformance.title: DescribeDBClusterResourcePoolPerformance
DescribeDBClusterResourcePoolPerformance.summary: Queries the monitoring information about resource groups within an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDBClusters.title: DescribeDBClusters
DescribeDBClusters.summary: Queries a list of AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters within a region.

DescribeDBResourceGroup.title: DescribeDBResourceGroup
DescribeDBResourceGroup.summary: Queries the information about a resource group for an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

DescribeDiagnosisDimensions.title: DescribeDiagnosisDimensions
DescribeDiagnosisDimensions.summary: Queries the deduplicated statistics of SQL statements that meet a condition of the resource group, database, username, and source IP address in an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDiagnosisRecords.title: DescribeDiagnosisRecords
DescribeDiagnosisRecords.summary: Queries the diagnostic information about SQL statements that meet a condition in an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDiagnosisSQLInfo.title: DescribeDiagnosisSQLInfo
DescribeDiagnosisSQLInfo.summary: Queries the execution information about an SQL statement, including the execution plan, execution information, resource usage, and self-diagnostics results.

DescribeDiagnosisTasks.title: DescribeDiagnosisTasks
DescribeDiagnosisTasks.summary: Queries the execution information about distributed tasks based on a stage in a query.

DescribeEIURange.title: DescribeEIURange
DescribeEIURange.summary: Queries the range for the number of elastic I/O units (EIUs) for an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

DescribeElasticPlan.title: DescribeElasticPlan
DescribeElasticPlan.summary: Queries scaling plans of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster. This operation can be used only for AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters in elastic mode for Cluster Edition.

DescribeInclinedTables.title: DescribeInclinedTables
DescribeInclinedTables.summary: Queries the monitoring information about tables.

DescribeLoadTasksRecords.title: DescribeLoadTasksRecords
DescribeLoadTasksRecords.summary: Queries the information about asynchronous import and export tasks of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeMaintenanceAction.title: DescribeMaintenanceAction
DescribeMaintenanceAction.summary: Queries the information about an O\\\&M event.

DescribePatternPerformance.title: DescribePatternPerformance
DescribePatternPerformance.summary: Queries the metrics of an SQL pattern such as the query duration and average memory usage within a period of time.

DescribeProcessList.title: DescribeProcessList
DescribeProcessList.summary: Queries the queries that are being executed on a cluster.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries a list of available regions and zones for AnalyticDB for MySQL.

DescribeSQLPatterns.title: DescribeSQLPatterns
DescribeSQLPatterns.summary: Queries a list of SQL patterns for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster within a period of time.

DescribeSQLPlan.title: DescribeSQLPlan
DescribeSQLPlan.summary: Queries the plan information about an SQL statement such as a query statement or an extract-transform-load (ETL) task statement.

DescribeSlowLogTrend.title: DescribeSlowLogTrend
DescribeSlowLogTrend.summary: Queries the trend of slow query logs for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeSqlPattern.title: DescribeSqlPattern
DescribeSqlPattern.summary: Queries a list of SQL patterns for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster within a time range.

DescribeTables.title: DescribeTables
DescribeTables.summary: Queries a list of tables in a database of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeTaskInfo.title: DescribeTaskInfo
DescribeTaskInfo.summary: Queries the information about a task.

DownloadDiagnosisRecords.title: DownloadDiagnosisRecords
DownloadDiagnosisRecords.summary: Downloads the diagnostic information about SQL statements that meet a condition for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

GrantOperatorPermission.title: GrantOperatorPermission
GrantOperatorPermission.summary: Grants permissions to the service account of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters, or the AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters that have tags added.

MigrateDBCluster.title: MigrateDBCluster
MigrateDBCluster.summary: Migrates data from a Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster to a Data Lakehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster in AnalyticDB for MySQL.

ModifyAutoRenewAttribute.title: ModifyAutoRenewAttribute
ModifyAutoRenewAttribute.summary: Modifies the auto-renewal status of a subscription AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyDBCluster.title: ModifyDBCluster
ModifyDBCluster.summary: Changes the specifications of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyDBClusterAccessWhiteList.title: ModifyDBClusterAccessWhiteList
ModifyDBClusterAccessWhiteList.summary: Modifies the IP address whitelists of a cluster.

ModifyDBClusterPayType.title: ModifyDBClusterPayType
ModifyDBClusterPayType.summary: Changes the billing method of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyDBResourceGroup.title: ModifyDBResourceGroup
ModifyDBResourceGroup.summary: Modifies the number of nodes or the query execution mode for a resource group of an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

ModifyDBResourcePool.title: ModifyDBResourcePool
ModifyDBResourcePool.summary: Modifies the resources of a resource group. This operation is available only for AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters in elastic mode for Cluster Edition.

ModifyElasticPlan.title: ModifyElasticPlan
ModifyElasticPlan.summary: Modifies a scheduled scaling plan. This operation can be used only for AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters in elastic mode for Cluster Edition.

ModifyLogBackupPolicy.title: ModifyLogBackupPolicy
ModifyLogBackupPolicy.summary: Modifies the log backup settings of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyMaintenanceAction.title: ModifyMaintenanceAction
ModifyMaintenanceAction.summary: Changes the switchover time of pending O\\\&M events.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Adds tags to an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

UnbindDBResourceGroupWithUser.title: UnbindDBResourceGroupWithUser
UnbindDBResourceGroupWithUser.summary: Disassociates a resource group of an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster from a database account.
